summary: This is an email from an assistant U.S. attorney to U.S. Attorney Geoffrey Berman regarding a draft bail reply filing in the Jeffrey Epstein case, attaching a document and noting a deadline.

persons.name: Geoffrey Berman
persons.role: U.S. Attorney for the Southern District of New York
persons.context: Recipient of the email regarding the draft bail reply in the Jeffrey Epstein case.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Subject of the bail reply document being discussed in the email.

connections.description: Berman, as U.S. Attorney, is overseeing the prosecution's legal actions against Epstein, including opposing his bail request.

events.title: Draft Bail Reply Filing Preparation
events.description: Prosecution team prepares and reviews a draft reply to oppose Jeffrey Epstein's request for bail release.

keyFacts: The email is dated July 12, 2019, during the period of Epstein's federal prosecution in New York.
The subject is a draft legal filing titled 'response_to_bail_release_request' opposing Epstein's request for bail.
The correspondence is between prosecutors in the U.S. Attorney's Office for the Southern District of New York.
There is a stated filing deadline of 5:00 PM on that day.
The attached document filename suggests it is the third draft of the prosecution's bail reply.
